metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${invoice_overdue_condition})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1682 Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
                        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > "Last Inv. Item Due Date")) > 0
        )
/ COUNT (case_id) * 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 No-Touch Invoice Processing Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of no-touch invoices with no change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES  (('Remove Dunning Block'
    		|'Set Dunning Block'|'Change Dunning Block'|'Send 1st Overdue Notice'
    		|'Update Baseline Date'|'Update Payment Term'|'Reverse Invoice'))) 
    	AND (event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice'))
	)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice'))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Early Payment Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 5 days before the due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days')
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metricsVariables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricsVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
